ygData.subject: strategy
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi ho everyone! DING!  Master Bard lady in freeport has granted me my 15th song.  Now to just find it.. hehe I ve been reading the success of many on here.
ygData.messageBody:
Hi ho everyone!

DING! Master Bard lady in freeport has granted me my 15th song. Now to just find it.. hehe

I've been reading the success of many on here. It's great to read all the info about songs, hunting grounds, and so forth and so on.

But, I've been trying to juggle my songs when I'm grouped with my darling husband Shaeloren (warrior). I hardly even use bellow until there at the end if it's needed.. i.e. when Shae's health is low and i'm tanking while he heals.


I seem to use str,heal,and bellows the most.

But mostly the str&heal part. I feel like i'm cheating myself here.

I've got everything set up on hot keys..so it's easy to swithch.. weapon,songs,instruments..

I am no strategist(sp?) by any means... I mean, I discovered by boo boo that i could juggle songs.. eh
Shae tries to help me work out which songs do us good for battles..but he's no bard.. and having him sit right beside me and he pops up..Use such in such.. well.. i've bitten him a few times with some piercing looks.. hehe

he's decided to let me play my bard the way I want to. I love Tel.. I've been every race,class there can be. I love my WElf Bard lady! =) But, Like I said Strategy is not my field.

Shae can lay down plots and what and how we can do and will do things easily. (thanks to uncle sam)..=)


Did I make any sense? Oh I hope so! hehe

Lady Bard signing off!






Angelfire for your free web-based e-mail. http://www.angelfire.com
